name: DOOORS ZERO - room escape game
description:
This is a new version of the "DOOORS" series, the stage clear-type escape game!
Now, ScrollView enables you to view 360 degree panoramas.

The goal of this game is to break out of the rooms.
Solve the hidden mysteries to open the doors and complete all the stages by making full use of iPhone gestures such as shaking or titling the device!

[Game Features]
- A 360 degree ScroollView
- Mini escape games that are perfect for killing your free time
- New unique stages
- Auto-save

[Notes]
- The game includes problem solving with sounds.
